message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a price of $11,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product and the market rate.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I could meet you halfway at $10,250. This offer reflects the true worth of what I'm offering.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9,800? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchasing the product if we can come to an agreement.
